text: Shunta Ishikura (born 7 January 1937) is a Japanese wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman light heavyweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Japan Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Toyama Prefecture
title: Shunta Ishikura
